Crazy Celvan was a mad inhabitant of the River District who could be found in the areas rooftop walkways in the late 14 century DR.
Celvan was a pale-skinned male gnome with gray hair.
In the , Crazy Celvan dispensed cryptic yet prophetic limericks at passers by only to disappear a moment later with a giggle. The strange little man once had a run-in with Abdel Adrian, a Bhaalspawn, and his companions.
